data.title: Pioneers For A Cure
data.text:
AMERICAN SONGS TO FIGHT CANCER’ ON AOL LISTENING PARTY!

Pioneers For A Cure’s ‘American Songs To Fight Cancer’ collection is featured in a live stream on the AOL Listening Party. Check it out! http://music.aol.com/new-releases-full-cds/#/10

SING FOR THE CURE: A NEW YORK ‘JAZZ RABBI’ JOINS A RABBI KOOK DISCIPLE TO RAISE MONEY TO FIGHT CANCER

Jerusalem Post by Gil Zohar In 1935, on Elul 3 according to the Hebrew calendar, Rabbi Avraham Itzchak HaCohen Kook, the Chief Ashkenazi Rabbi of Palestine, died of cancer in Jerusalem. A group of Israeli and American musicians have recorded songs popular with the...
